2.0.2 Mean of temperature

tempmean <- mean(airquality$Temp,na.rm=TRUE)
[1] 77.88235

ozonemax <- max(airquality$Ozone,na.rm=TRUE) 
[1] 168

2.0.10 Parameter estimates using matrix calculations

yvalues <- cars$dist 
xvalues <- cars$speed 

f <- function(xvalues,yvalues){
 
  y <- as.matrix(yvalues)
  x <- cbind(1,as.matrix(xvalues))
  beta <- solve(t(x)%*%x)%*%t(x)%*%y
  n <- nrow(y)
  k <- ncol(x)
  residual <- (y-x%*%beta)
  fraction <- 1/(n-k)
  rss <-sum(residual^2)
  s <- sqrt(rss*fraction)
  varres <- s^2*solve(t(x)%*%x)
  se <- sqrt(diag(varres))
  return(list("coefficents"=beta,"std.error"=se))
}
modelcalc <- f(xvalues,yvalues)
modelcalc 
$coefficents
           [,1]
[1,] -17.579095
[2,]   3.932409

$std.error
[1] 6.7584402 0.4155128

2.0.11 Fitting a linear model using lm()

modelfit <- lm(dist~speed,data=cars) 
summary(modelfit) 

Call:
lm(formula = dist ~ speed, data = cars)

Residuals:
    Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
-29.069  -9.525  -2.272   9.215  43.201 

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept) -17.5791     6.7584  -2.601   0.0123 *  
speed         3.9324     0.4155   9.464 1.49e-12 ***
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 15.38 on 48 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.6511,    Adjusted R-squared:  0.6438 
F-statistic: 89.57 on 1 and 48 DF,  p-value: 1.49e-12

2.0.12 Comparing coefficients

lmcoe <- coef(modelfit)
(Intercept)       speed 
 -17.579095    3.932409 
calcoe <-modelcalc$coefficents
           [,1]
[1,] -17.579095
[2,]   3.932409

2.0.13 Comparing standard errors

lmse <- summary(modelfit)$coefficients[, 2]
(Intercept)       speed 
  6.7584402   0.4155128 
calstd <- modelcalc$std.error
[1] 6.7584402 0.4155128
